title: sd email投訴打記者推上國際 求幫手

replies.msg:
出面太多post好亂 唔知有無人已經有打
好趕咁draft左封信 英文麻麻地可能要再執
有無人幫手改/搵資料/搵埋可以寄比邊個？



To whom it may concern,

As an ordinary Hong Kong citizen, I am writing to express my concern over the questionable acts of Hong Kong police to the local and foreign press.

Hong Kong people have been holding protests about the extradition law and the press is surely responsible and reasonable to report it, while most of them are shooting only in appropriate distance to the police and protesters.

However, some police officers used pepper spray, tear gas and even attack the journalists physically for quite many times, given that THEY HAVE CLEARLY STATED THEIR IDENTITY AS A JOURNALIST VERBALLY or HAVING THE WORD “PRESS” WRITTEN ON THEIR HELMETS, and all they have done is JUST shooting and reporting.

As an authentic organisation, I sincerely ask for your help to the local and worldwide press unfairly and violently treated by police in Hong Kong, to condemn and stop the cruel acts of Hong Kong Police, as well as to appropriately punish them. Only with your help that we could stop these cruel acts of Hong Kong police, and protect the safety of press in Hong Kong.

There are so many videos and photos captured the moments of Hong Kong Police was attacking the press DELIBERATELY, attached below are some of them for your reference.

Source: https://hk.news.appledaily.com/local/daily/article/20190614/20703865



Source: Cable TV News
